effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 494,708 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 223,404.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants nsurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 362 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.
